name: Eye On Gold On Idol
description:
The Story So Far....

Welcome to special promotional App for the upcoming 30th anniversary DVD release of "Voodoo Snake Massacre  Trilogy" Now including 3 new special commentary tracks! 

1) Featuring surviving cast members talking over the original movies.  

2) Featuring a live recording of the midnight theater experience where mean film viewers yell cutting remarks at screen and to each other. 

3) Featuring writer director and producer playing drinking game with himself, you could play along! 

How To Play

Press Space Bar to roll your eyes sarcastically at the ironic film

Collect all the gold Idols to massacre the voodoo snakes once and for all!

Oh no your eye explode! well just play again for high score! Or stop playing and just go buy DVD! now available at Circuit City and K-Mart.
